org.kepler.configuration

Class CommonsConfigurationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.configuration.CommonsConfigurationReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationReader

    public class CommonsConfigurationReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationReader
    An interface to the deserialization methods required by the configuration manager to deserialize properties
